thread.title: Guy pulls hilariously cruel Valentine’s Day prank on girlfriend (11 Photos)
thread.title_full: Guy pulls hilariously cruel Valentine’s Day prank on girlfriend (11 Photos)

author: Matt
title: Guy pulls hilariously cruel Valentine’s Day prank on girlfriend (11 Photos)
text:
View as Slideshow 1 
When Laura Marie Kerr received a text from her boyfriend on Valentine’s Day promising a surprise, she must have had no idea of the emotional rollercoaster she was about to go on…. 2 
A trip to Paris for Valentine’s Day!? A little cliched but still impressive. But, wait, it gets better… 3 
Wow, Barcelona as well? This Northern Irish gentleman is really putting every guy to shame with the lengths he is willing to go to assure the love of his li… 4 
Yep, that’s right, he just intended for them to go and watch the Champions League game between Paris St.Germain and F.C Barcelona at the local pub, which is literally the opposite of a romantic European getaway. 
She wasn’t exactly pleased…. 5 
Some pointed out he may have had an ulterior motive. Advertisement
